title: Typeface used in Mastercard ad (image supplied)
content:
Hi readers

I was just wondering if anyone can let me know what font is used in the following Master card ads - I just need some clarification on them.

Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150307043949im_/http:/typophile.com/files/incomm_paper_5340.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150307043949im_/http:/typophile.com/files/MasterCard_01_web_3603.jpg)
author: QueenSammy

comments.content: The type at the top looks like [FF DIN](http://web.archive.org/web/20150307043949/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/fontfont/ff_din_ot_collection), but it's rather small and hard to ID for me. The type at the bottom is just too small (though my knee-jerk guess is [Joanna](http://web.archive.org/web/20150307043949/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/joanna)); maybe someone else can help. Or please post higher resolution images.

FF Din for sure; down, yes, too small.

dr
